'''1.19.83''' is a hotfix to ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' released on May 17, 2023, which fixes bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/15837147699853-Minecraft-1-19-83-Bedrock-|title=Minecraft - 1.19.83 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=May 17, 2023}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.19.83 Hotfix|otherissuescount=2
|;old
|169176|Inventory cursor jumps all over the place.
|170184|Trade Tables no longer support custom entity Spawn Eggs.
}}
'''Other'''
* Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay.
* Fixed custom textures that override ‘minecraft’ blocks with aux metadata as a list of textures.

== Trivia ==
*This version was released 14 years after [[Classic 0.0.11a]], the first publicly released version of {{JE}}.
